The Syncfusion [Numeric TextBox](https://www.syncfusion.com/xamarin-ui-controls/xamarin-numeric-entry?utm_source=nuget&utm_medium=listing&utm_campaign=xamarin-numeric-textbox-nuget) for Xamarin.Forms restricts input of numeric values. It also provides support for culture-based formatting.

## Key features:
* FormatString: Input string can be formatted by using format strings.
* Culture: Number format can be localized to any specific culture.
* AllowNull: Allows the user to set null value.
* ParserMode: Value gets parsed based on the parser mode.

**Note:** This package needs to be installed in all Xamarin.Forms projects (PCL/.NET Standard, Android, iOS, and UWP).
